page.title: 10ADULT RECREATION, EASTFIELD
page.content: Adults who live in Eastfield can choose from a varied selection of sports activities and social organizations. There is an active sports association, providing track sports, football, rugby and similar activities. These take place on the playing field behind Eastway where there are football, rugby and cricket pitches. A well stocked public lending library and a community centre are situated near the shops. The community centre is used by various groups for bingo, dancing and yoga. The Salvation Army also hold services there. In addition to these activities there are special interest clubs and teams such as the pigeon fanciers, the citizens' band radio club and darts teams.
